item.title: Hauler Hero collects $16M for its AI waste management software
item.dc:creator: Rebecca Szkutak
item.description: Hauler Hero has seen its customer base, revenue, and head count double since the company raised its seed round in 2024.

item.title: Former GitHub CEO raises record $60M dev tool seed round at $300M valuation
item.dc:creator: Julie Bort
item.description: Thomas Dohmke's new startup offers an AI system to allow developers to better manage all the code AI agents produce.

item.title: Proptech startup Smart Bricks raises $5 million pre-seed led by a16z
item.dc:creator: Dominic-Madori Davis
item.description: Smart Bricks is an AI-powered proptech that helps investors find high-quality real estate investments

item.title: Primary Ventures raises healthy $625M Fund V to focus on seed investing
item.dc:creator: Dominic-Madori Davis
item.description: Primary Ventures has closed a $625 million fund focused on seed investing nationwide. It's a sizeable accomplishment for a seed-stage VC firm.

item.title: Databricks CEO says SaaS isn’t dead, but AI will soon make it irrelevant
item.dc:creator: Julie Bort
item.description: AI isn't going to replace major SaaS apps with vibe-coded versions, Databricks CEO Ali Ghodsi believes. But it could give rise to competitors.

item.title: Harvey reportedly raising at $11B valuation just months after it hit $8B
item.dc:creator: Julie Bort
item.description: After announcing $190 million in ARR in December, Harvey may be raising again.

item.title: Ex-Googlers are building infrastructure to help companies understand their video data
item.dc:creator: Kate Park
item.description: Founded by former Google Japan leaders, InfiniMind is building enterprise AI to turn vast, unused video archives into searchable, actionable business intelligence.

item.title: Uber to buy delivery arm of Turkey’s Getir
item.dc:creator: Ram Iyer
item.description: The deal will see Uber paying $335 million at the outset to purchase Getir's food delivery business. Uber will also pay $100 million for a 15% stake in Getir's grocery, retail, and water delivery business.

item.title: Call for speakers: TechCrunch Founder Summit 2026
item.dc:creator: TechCrunch Events
item.description: Submit to speak at TechCrunch Founder Summit 2026 to lead a roundtable. Share scaling insights with 1,100 founders on June 23 in Boston.

item.title: The battle begins: 2026 Startup Battlefield 200 nominations are open
item.dc:creator: TechCrunch Events
item.description: Calling Pre-Series A founders: nominations for TechCrunch Startup Battlefield 200 are open. Compete in the world’s most iconic pitch competition at Disrupt 2026 from October 13 - 15.

item.title: Gather AI, maker of ‘curious’ warehouse drones, lands $40M led by Keith Block’s firm
item.dc:creator: Julie Bort
item.description: Gather AI has closed funding from former Salesforce CEO's firm Smith Point Capital. Its warehouse AI system doesn't just scan. It seeks out specific data.

item.title: India has changed its startup rules for deep tech
item.dc:creator: Jagmeet Singh
item.description: India is adjusting startup rules to help more of its deep tech startups with funding and long-term success.

item.title: How Elon Musk is rewriting the rules on founder power
item.dc:creator: Theresa Loconsolo
item.description: Elon Musk has merged SpaceX and xAI, creating what might be the blueprint for a new Silicon Valley power structure. With his $800 billion net worth already rivaling historic conglomerate GE’s peak market cap, and Musk being vocal about his view that “tech victory is decided by velocity of innovation,” the question isn’t whether a personal conglomerate can be built, but rather how far Musk himself is […]

item.title: Reddit says it’s looking for more acquisitions in adtech and elsewhere
item.dc:creator: Sarah Perez
item.description: Reddit said during earnings it's looking to buy 'capabilities' and 'companies.'

item.title: How far will Elon Musk take the ‘everything’ business as SpaceX and xAI merge?
item.dc:creator: Theresa Loconsolo, Kirsten Korosec, Anthony Ha, Sean O'Kane
item.description: Elon Musk has merged SpaceX and xAI, creating what might be the blueprint for a new Silicon Valley power structure. With his $800 billion net worth already rivaling historic conglomerate GE’s peak market cap, and Musk being vocal about his view that “tech victory is decided by velocity of innovation,” the question isn’t whether a personal conglomerate can be built, but rather how far Musk himself is […]

item.title: a16z VC wants founders to stop stressing over insane ARR numbers
item.dc:creator: Julie Bort
item.description: Andreessen Horowitz VC Jennifer Li⁠, who oversees some of the firm's fastest-growing AI companies, warns founders not to believe every ARR claim made on X.

item.title: Fundamental raises $255M Series A with a new take on big data analysis
item.dc:creator: Russell Brandom
item.description: Fundamental has built a new foundation model to solve an old problem: how to draw insights from the huge quantities of structured data produced by enterprises.

item.title: Stripe alumni raise €30M Series A for Duna, backed by Stripe and Adyen execs
item.dc:creator: Anna Heim
item.description: Having raised a €30 million Series A round led by CapitalG, business identity verification startup Duna is now among the most well-capitalized European startups founded by Stripe alumni.

item.title: Meet Gizmo: A TikTok for interactive, vibe-coded mini apps
item.dc:creator: Sarah Perez
item.description: Gizmo's app is like a TikTok for vibe-coded mini apps... and it's a lot of fun.

item.title: AI SRE Resolve AI confirms $125M raise, unicorn valuation
item.dc:creator: Marina Temkin
item.description: The two-year-old startup confirms that it closed a Series A led by Lightspeed at $1 billion valuation.
